description:
How do you make everyone on your team passionate about writing and running tests?

Simple enough, really. You’ve heard of Testcontainers - open-source libraries for running things in containers, making your tests repeatable and self-contained, and verifying your code works with real dependencies.

Now add Testcontainers Cloud -- the simplest way to run Testcontainers tests at scale!

We’ll show you how to get started with Testcontainers Cloud on your laptop and CI without demanding you to be a Docker expert.

Join us to learn how you can speed up your continuous integration pipelines, make developer love running tests even more, and ship faster and with confidence!
title: Run Tests, Not containers
